body_html:
Hi standy66@, thanks for reporting the issue. Yes only linear_input input_mode is handled for the saveable. The reason is we intend to make sure cudnn-trained checkpoint can be used by regular TF RNNs. Skipping the input isn't what regular TF RNNs do.

I wonder if it would be a problem if we remove the input_mode option from the cudnn_rnn layers API? If one uses cudnn_rnn_ops, they will still be functional, only that users will need to manage saving/restoring variables in canonical format themselves.
